== System requirements ==

 * Maven 2.2.1
 * The Grinder 3.6
 * The Grinder Analyzer V2.b16
 * Jython 2.5.2
 * jdk 1.6.0_21
 * Codigo de The Grinder (package grinder-core, grinder-http,...)

== How to install the plugin ==

 * Download zip file grinderplugin.zip
 * Extract to directory named _grinderplugin_
 * Open a shell and cd into this directory
 * Execute the follow command line:
{{{
    mvn install
}}}
